msg: BOOKKEEPER-765 bookkeeper script should fall back to java in path if JAVA_HOME is not set (ivank)

author: markt
msg: APR/native used a separate flag to stop the thread. This avoided issues where running was set true->false-true in quick succession. This fix is now available to NIO2 and BIO as well.
Note NIO does not (currently) use the AsyncTimeout
